Cooperation on Combating Human Smuggling and Trafficking Act
Cooperation on Combating Human Smuggling and Trafficking Act

A bill to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to enhance border security by seeking to expand partnerships with appropriate law enforcement entities in Mexico and Central American and South American countries to combat human smuggling and trafficking operations in Mexico and such countries, and for other purposes.
